BS_Outside_Card: List out the business source of your service, this will let us categorise your service and direct potential buyers accordingly
Trade_Outside_Card: You can mention all your trade information for the buyers who are intrested in purchasing your service.
BS_Inside_Card: Select the Business Source that you have used for your previous services or create a new one.
Trade_Inside_Card: Select the trade information that you have used for your previous service or create a new one.
CA_Info_Map_sub: Map your Sevice to the existing Activity Information.
BS_BS_MapBS: Select the Business Source that you have used for your previous service.
BS_Trade_Map_Trade_Dtls: Select the Trade Information that you have used for your previous service.
Add_Additional_Info: Adding these additional information about your service will increase your profile visibility to the buyers will get more responses from our market.
Wholesale: Map the information of your Wholesale / Distributor, who sells your Products in the market.
Retailer: Map the information of your Retailer, who sells your Products in the market.
Agent: Map the information of your Agent, who sells your Products in the market.
Principle: Map the information of your Principle, who sells your Products in the market.
Gov_Agency: Map the information of your Government Agency / Organization, who sells your Products in the market.
Stockist: Map the information of your Stockist, who sells your Products in the market.
Trade_House: Map the information of your Trade House, who sells your Products in the market.
min_field_validation: The Minimum Order value should be lesser than the Maximum Order value.
Others: Map the information of your Other market presence, who sells your Products in the market.
Clientele: Map the information of your Client, who sells your Products in the market
Service_Info: Give a generic description for your Service highlighting its features and merits.
Service_Specification: Give a detailed description of your Service, describing its specifications and features.
CA_Info_Select_Activity_Category: Select the Activity of the service that your are providing.
CA_Info_Select_Activity_Category_Outside: Categorise your activity based on the UNSPSC standards
CA_Info_Select_serv_category_pro_note: Select the unique UNSPSC category that matches your Service.
CA_Info_Select_serv_category: The United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) is a taxonomy of Services and Services for use in eCommerce.
CA_Info_select_serv_category_fild_note: Select the UNSPSC Service Category of the service that you are providing.
BS_Change_Message: On changing the business source the corresponding contact information mapped towards it will be reset. Do you want to proceed?
Trading: Map the information of your Trade, who sells your Products in the market.
Service_readiness_info: Looks like you haven't filled all your service information yet, fill in all the information to get good responses from the buyers.
